alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 5:12AM CDT until June 19 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 512 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brantley, or 9 miles south of Luverne, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Lee, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Kinston, Napier Field, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald and Camp Humming Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
